directions: Mix green beans, soup, milk, soy sauce, 2/3 cup onions and pepper together in an oven safe casserole dish.
Bake for 25 minutes. Sprinkle remaining onions on top and bake for an additional 5 minutes or until onions are crispy.
Kitchen Tip: Makes a great traditional dish to serve at the holiday table.
ingredients: 1 (16 oz) bag Birds Eye® Cut Green Beans, thawed and drained
1 (10.75 oz) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
title: Classic Green Bean Casserole
